name: Titanium.UI.iOS.SnapBehavior
summary: Dynamic behavior defining an item's movement to a specific point.

properties.name: damping
properties.summary: Specifies the amount of oscillation during the conclusion of the snap.
properties.description: A value of 0.0 indicates minimum oscillation, while 1.0 indicates maximum oscillation.

properties.name: snapPoint
properties.description: The coordinate system depends on the animator's reference view.
